thread.title: Nick Gordon gave 'toxic mix' to Bobbi Kristina Brown
thread.title_full: Nick Gordon gave 'toxic mix' to Bobbi Kristina Brown - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Nick Gordon gave 'toxic mix' to Bobbi Kristina Brown
text:
Nick Gordon accused of injecting Bobbi Kristina with a ‘toxic mixture’. Nick Gordon has been accused of injecting Bobbi Kristina Brown with a ‘toxic mixture’ before her death.
The allegations have been made in a new filing in a $10million lawsuit against Nick, the former boyfriend of Whitney Houston's late daughter.

Aspiring singer Bobbi died in July, almost six months after she was found unresponsive in a bathtub at her home in Georgia.
Documents filed by Bobbi's conservator, claim 22-year-old Bobbi died after “a violent altercation with defendant after which he placed her in the bathtub unconscious, after he injected her with a toxic mixture”.
Nick has previously denied all allegations against him and called the wrongful death civil lawsuit “slanderous and merit-less”.
